00009 using namespace cv;

00014 int last_id = 0;
00016 map<int,VideoWriter> obj_;
00017 
00018 // Local scope
00019 namespace {
00021 class open_options {
00022 public:
00023     int fourcc;
00024     double fps;
00025     bool isColor;
00026     open_options(vector<MxArray>::iterator first,
00027                  vector<MxArray>::iterator last) :
00028         fourcc(CV_FOURCC('U','2','6','3')),  // H263 codec
00029         fps(25),
00030         isColor(true)
00031     {
00032         if (((last-first)%2)!=0)
00033             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00034         for (; first < last; first+=2) {
00035             string key((*first).toString());
00036             MxArray& val = *(first+1);
00037             if (key=="fourcc") {
00038                 if (val.isChar()) {                    
00039                     string x(val.toString());
00040                     fourcc = CV_FOURCC(x[0],x[1],x[2],x[3]);
00041                 }
00042                 else {
00043                     fourcc = val.toInt();
00044                 }
00045             }
00046             else if (key=="FPS")
00047                 fps = val.toDouble();
00048             else if (key=="Color")
00049                 isColor = val.toBool();
00050             else
00051                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00052         }
00053     };
00054 };
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00065 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00066                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00067 {
00068     if (nrhs<1 || nlhs>1)
00069         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00070     
00071     // Determine argument format between constructor or (id,method,...)
00072     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00073     int id = 0;
00074     string method;
00075     if (rhs[0].isChar() && nrhs>=2) {
00076         // Constructor is called. Create a new object from argument
00077         string filename(rhs[0].toString());
00078         Size frameSize(rhs[1].toSize());
00079         open_options opts(rhs.begin()+2,rhs.end());
00080         obj_[++last_id] = VideoWriter(filename, opts.fourcc, opts.fps, frameSize, opts.isColor);
00081         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00082         return;
00083     }
00084     else if (rhs[0].isNumeric() && rhs[0].numel()==1 && nrhs>1) {
00085         id = rhs[0].toInt();
00086         method = rhs[1].toString();
00087     }
00088     else
00089         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid arguments");
00090     
00091     // Big operation switch
00092     VideoWriter& obj = obj_[id];
00093     if (method == "delete") {
00094         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs!=0)
00095             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Output not assigned");
00096         obj_.erase(id);
00097     }
00098     else if (method == "open") {
00099         if (nrhs<4)
00100             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00101         string filename(rhs[2].toString());
00102         Size frameSize(rhs[3].toSize());
00103         open_options opts(rhs.begin()+4,rhs.end());
00104         bool b = obj.open(filename, opts.fourcc, opts.fps, frameSize, opts.isColor);
00105         plhs[0] = MxArray(b);
00106     }
00107     else if (method == "isOpened") {
00108         if (nrhs!=2)
00109             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00110         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.isOpened());
00111     }
00112     else if (method == "write") {
00113         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs>0)
00114             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00115         Mat frame(rhs[2].toMat());
00116         if (frame.type()==CV_8UC3)
00117             cvtColor(frame,frame,CV_RGB2BGR);
00118         obj.write(frame);
00119     }
00120     else
00121         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized operation");
00122 }
